DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of different screening score for hypoxemic OSA (Obstructive Sleep Apnea) with the results of a polysomnography (PSG). The different screening score studied are: STOP-BANG, DES-OSA, P-SAP and OSA50.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Different Screening Score for Hypoxemic OSA (Obstructive Sleep Apnea) With the Results of a Polysomnography (PSG)
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators should compare the four screening scores (STOP-BANG, DES-OSA, P-SAP and OSA50) with the results of the PSG (and in particular the number of apnea and hypopnea index and the probability of hypoxemia).
